# Rapid Shot (Feat)
## Overview
You can make an additional ranged attack.

**Prerequisites**: Dex 13, [[Point-Blank Shot (Feat)|Point-Blank Shot]].

**Benefit**: When making a full-attack action with a ranged weapon, you can fire one additional time this round. All of your attack rolls take a â€“2 penalty when using Rapid Shot.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 132
